title: Clubs want to print the Boiler Plate language on contracts
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is in view or edit mode on a player's contract
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks 'print' to the left of edit/save buttons
custom_expected: THEN pdf will populate in new tab

title: Club Spanish-speaking players want to see boiler plate language translated to Spanish
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has selected 'Spanish' in the language field on a player's contract
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks 'Print'
custom_expected:
THEN PDF should generate in a new tab translated into Spanish
AND translation should follow the English version

title: Club can print Addendum B of contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has created a new non-first year contract
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks print clicks 'print'

1. WHEN user fills out multiple Addendum Bs
AND clicks 'print
custom_expected:
THEN Add B should generate and print as it was entered into EBIS
AND it should show the header and footer and follow the template

1. THEN add a page break after the footer "No Other Provisions"

title: Club can print Addendum B - Minor League Terms
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has created a new non-first year contract
custom_steps:
WHEN user toggles Minor League Terms to Yes
AND clicks 'print'
custom_expected:
THEN Add B - Minor League Terms should generate and print as it was entered into EBIS
AND data appears as it was entered into EBIS
AND the layout and behavior follow the template and report details
AND any fields not filled out should print blank

title: Club can print Addendum B - Termination Pay Clauses
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has created a new non-first year contract
custom_steps:
WHEN user toggles Termination Pay to Yes
AND clicks 'print'
custom_expected:
THEN Add B - Termination Pay should generate and print as it was entered into EBIS
AND data appears as it was entered into EBIS
AND the layout and behavior follow the template and report details
AND any fields not filled out should print blank

title: Club can print Addendum B - Major League Terms
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has created a new non-first year contract
custom_steps:
WHEN user toggles Major League Terms to Yes
AND clicks 'print'
custom_expected:
THEN Add B - Major League Terms should generate and print as it was entered into EBIS
AND data appears as it was entered into EBIS
AND the layout and behavior follow the template and report details
AND any fields not filled out should print blank

title: Club can have page numbering
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has created a new non-first year contract
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks 'print'
custom_expected:
THEN the contract should have page number starting at page 1 as shown in the [sample](https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/2347185?projectId=14044)
AND Addendums C, E, F and G should each be one page
AND start on their own page
AND other addendums should begin on the same page unless less then 1/4 of the page is remainng

title: BO - Data sources for Addendum E, F, G, H
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is viewing the report details for  Addendum E, F, G and H
custom_expected: THEN the data sources column is populated for all fields

title: BO - Data sources for Life Insurance section
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is viewing the report details for Life Insurance Section
custom_expected: THEN the data sources column is populated for all fields

title: As BOC/Club I want to view old Ebis1 Contracts in Player History
custom_preconds: GIVEN that a club user is viewing a player's history
custom_expected:
THEN they can see historical entries for Non first-year contracts
AND the entries link to the appropriate contracts
AND the entries will contain the following Column Data
- Date = Player's signing date
- Code = "Min Cont"
- From = [Org abbreviation] / [Club nickname] 
- To = empty field
- Description = "Signed a Minor League Contract for [Number of Seasons] years. Signing Bonus: [Signing bonus value as shown in his Contract History].

title: As BOC I want to see contracts created in Ebis1/2 in detail
custom_steps: WHEN club user opens a minor league non-first year contract from 2010 or before (migrated from EBIS 1)
custom_expected:
THEN EBIS 2 UI Fields including those that have moved or had other changes should be populated correctly. Refer to the mapping table for a list of all fields that have changes in Ebis 2
![](index.php?/attachments/get/2739)

title: as BOC/Club I want to see timestamps on comments section in Add Cs
custom_steps: WHEN user makes changes to the comment section of an Addendum C and saves
custom_expected: THEN the time stamp next to the comments section will reflect the time of the latest changes

title: As a club/BOC, I want to see Contract years remaining on Add Cs
As BOC, I want to set up and edit signatories on behalf of club *
As BOC I can edit the contract on behalf of the club
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am logged in as BOC
custom_steps: WHEN I view a contract in any of these states [Preliminary, Terms Submitted, terms accepted]
custom_expected:
THEN I can edit and save the following information -
-Add Sections/Addendums to the contract in all states
-Add contract attachment in prelim
-Change or update signatory
-Change signing date (which should reflect on player history and contract history tabs)
-Edit ORG in Add A

title: As BOC I want to be stopped if Im missing required fields
custom_preconds: GIVEN that BOC is viewing a Preliminary minor contract
custom_steps:
WHEN BOC changes a contract from Preliminary > Terms Submitted 
AND from Terms Submitted >Terms Accepted.
custom_expected:
THEN BOC can make the state change from both view and edit mode
AND if state change is made in edit mode, all changes are auto-saved
AND If required fields are missing, show hard errors for BOC on state change. All AC for that were implemented for following club stories must be met
[#113667529](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/113667529) [C85974](http://10.4.36.21/testrail/index.php?/cases/view/85974)
[#115941543](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/115941543) [C85975](http://10.4.36.21/testrail/index.php?/cases/view/85975)
[#114125733](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/114125733) [C85977](http://10.4.36.21/testrail/index.php?/cases/view/85977)

title: As BOC I want to create a new contract on behalf of club
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am logged in as BOC
custom_steps: WHEN I attempt to create a contract on behalf of a club from contract history
custom_expected:
THEN I can create and save a contract
AND I can attach files in any state
AND these ovveridable rules are run [see linked pivotal story]

title: As BOC I can accept terms on a contract from clipboard
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as BOC
AND have selected one or more Terms Submitted contract from the clipboard
AND the 'accept terms' button has been activated
custom_steps: WHEN I click Accept terms button
custom_expected:
THEN [linked story] rule checks are run
AND contracts are updated to Terms Accepted
AND contracts stay on the clipboard with updated status change

title: As club/boc I want to create a contract or add c from player history or roster
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am logged in as BOC or a club user
custom_steps:
WHEN -
(1)I view the player history create new popup
(2) I view the Minor League Roster
(3)I view the Major League ROster
custom_expected:
THEN
(1)Add C and Minor Contract options appear
(2) Add C and Minor Contract options appear
(3)Add C and Minor Contract options appear

title: As BOC I want to override errors on my contract *
As a club I want to be stopped if my player's major league base salary is below the minimum *
As BOC I want to view errors around attached files
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am logged in as BOC
custom_steps:
AND I am on a players contract
AND I have attached files with labels
custom_expected:
THEN the rule checks hard errors[linked story] must be run on SAVE and any state change
AND missed required fields are highlighted in red

title: As BOC I want to add F/G back to contract
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as BOC 
AND  it is before the system date Begin to create MN contracts for following year
And check if the player does have an active MJC for this year
[conditions outlined in linked story]
custom_steps: WHEN I view players contract
custom_expected:
THEN I can see that Addendums F and G are not automatically added
AND as a BOC, I can add these terms manually
AND as a club, I cannot add these manually for the same player

title: As BOC I want to view hard errors on a contract
custom_steps:
WHEN BOC changes contract state from Preliminary > Terms Submitted

AND WHEN BOC changes contract state from Terms Submitted > Terms Accepted

title: As a club, I want to be stopped if the Roster type requirement date is after the Player Release date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user has created a contract with a Release clause
AND Roster Type Requirement Date is after the Player Release Request Date
custom_steps: WHEN BOC accepts terms on this contract
custom_expected: THEN show hard error on submit: "Roster Type Requirement Date cannot be after the Player Release Request Date

title: As a club, I want a notification when contract Terms are accepted
custom_steps: When BOC updates a contract status to "Terms Accepted"
custom_expected:
THEN all Club admins for the club that player is signing with, will receive a notification in the Club notification widget
AND Type = Minor Contracts
AND Populate Org column (3 letter abbreviation only) and Player column (Roster name)
AND Description = Terms accepted for Minor League Contract

title: As a user, I should be able to see attachments that were added to a player's minor contract in eBis1 *
As club/BOC, I want to see contract Addendum C's formatted correctly in old contracts *
As BOC I want to pre-approve a contract
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as BOC
AND have opened a contract that is Terms Accepted [from clipboard or contract history]
custom_steps: WHEN I scroll down and click Pre-Approve
custom_expected:
THEN contract reloads in view mode with Pre approved status
AND Contract falls off approvals clipboard
AND blue success notification was shown

title: As BOC, I want to view Addendum C warnings when pre-approving a contract *
As BOC I want to view overrideable warnings when I preapprove a contract *
As BOC I want to see had errors when I preapprove a contract
custom_steps: WHEN BOC moves a contract from Terms Accepted to Pre-approved
custom_expected:
THEN run the following rule checks, and if they fail, show a hard error for BOC:
[C109788](http://10.4.36.21/testrail/index.php?/cases/view/109788)
[C109751](http://10.4.36.21/testrail/index.php?/cases/view/109751)
[C109784](http://10.4.36.21/testrail/index.php?/cases/view/109784)
[C109757](http://10.4.36.21/testrail/index.php?/cases/view/109757)
[C109756](http://10.4.36.21/testrail/index.php?/cases/view/109756)
[C109758](http://10.4.36.21/testrail/index.php?/cases/view/109758)

title: As BOC I want to see required field errors when I preapprove a contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN that BOC is viewing a Terms Accepted minor contract
custom_steps: WHEN user moves the contract to the Pre-Approved state,
custom_expected:
THEN rule checks that were run on previous state changes will still run:
[C146727](http://10.4.36.21/testrail/index.php?/cases/view/146727)

title: As BOC I want be warned if Im preapproving a contract w/out attachment
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as BOC
AND have located a Terms Accepted Contract
AND the contract does NOT have an attachment with label CONTRACT
custom_steps: WHEN I attempt to Pre approve this contract
custom_expected: THEN I will get an overridable warning that says This Contract is missing an attachment with label "Contract"

title: As a club, I do not want other clubs to see comments or attachments on my contracts
custom_steps: WHEN a club is looking at another club's contract that is Terms Accepted or higher
custom_expected:
THEN user cannot see any attached files labelled "Miscellaneous"
AND users can however seee attachments labelled "Contract"
AND user cannot also see the Comments section

title: As Club I want to attach files and edit player information in TA state
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am logged in as a club user
custom_steps: WHEN I view a player's Terms accepted contract
custom_expected:
THEN I am unable to edit anything but the following fields - 
- Player's street address and city, state, zip fields in Player summary section
- Location Signed fields in Execution of Contract section
- Signatory and Negotiator fields in Execution of Contract section
- The club comments field

AND I can attach files and SAVE these changes

AND I cannot add/remove clauses or addendums (Add terms is locked)

title: As Club I want to see items that are pending approval
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am logged in as a club
custom_steps:
WHEN I view my homepage
Under the notifications Clipboard
custom_expected:
THEN I will see a widget called Pending Approvals
AND there are no buttons or flags on this widget
AND it only shows items where the TO and FROM orgs are logged in ORG

title: As Club I want to be stopped if MJ salary does not meet minimum requirements
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am logged in as a club
custom_steps:
WHEN I attempt to submit a minor contract
AND the MJ league Base Salary for any year is NOT equal to or higher than the minimum set in the LRD system value [Min MJ League Salary Rate]
custom_expected:
THEN I will get a hard error on submission thar reads
"Major League Base Salary does not meet the minimum amount [amount from system values]"

title: As club I want date that player was added to roster backdated
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as BOC
AND have located a Terms Submited contract that was updated prior to todays date
custom_steps:
WHEN I click on Accept Terms on this contrct
AND I view the players player history
custom_expected:
THEN the player should have an entry for signed MNC with the date the contract was Terms Submitted (not terms accepted)
AND the player should have a second entry in player history with the same date with description
"Player added to roster as Pending Active"

title: As club I want to be stopped if my players MN salary does not meet minimum requirements *
As club I want to be stopped from attaching files or modifying preapproved contracts
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am logged in as a club
custom_steps:
WHEN I navigate to a Pre Approved contract 
(via search or clipboard)
custom_expected:
THEN I can see that  I am unable to edit any fields
AND there is no EDIT button, only CLOSE

title: As club/BOC I ant to see release clause in Old contracts in old format *
As BOC I want to set LRD Values
custom_steps: WHEN a BOC user clicks System Admin
custom_expected:
THEN they can set the LRD system values in their own tab
AND number fields and Date fields should only accept valid number or date values
AND commas should be auto added on Save
AND the % icon should appear to the right of the number field and is not editable
AND BOC can set values for multiple years
AND all edit/save functionality and look and feel should match with the System Dates and Club dates screen

title: As a User, I want PDF attachments to open in my browser *
